# stopProxy(with:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Stop the network proxy.

## Declaration

```swift
func stopProxy(with reason: NEProviderStopReason, completionHandler: @escaping () -> Void)
```

```swift
func stopProxy(with reason: NEProviderStopReason) async
```

## Parameters

- **reason**: A `NEProviderStopReason` code indicating why the proxy is being stopped. For a list of possible codes, see [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEProvider].
- **completionHandler**: A block that must be executed when the proxy is fully stopped.

## Discussion

This method is called by the system to stop the network proxy.

`NEAppProxyProvider` subclasses must override this method.

Do not use this method to stop the proxy from the App Proxy Provider. Use `cancelProxyWithError:` instead.

## Managing the app proxy life cycle

- **startProxy(options:completionHandler:)**: Start the network proxy.
- **cancelProxyWithError(_:)**: Stop the network proxy from the App Proxy Provider.

items.description: Stop the network proxy from the App Proxy Provider.
